response.overview: Presenting GREAT PLAYS FROM GREAT GAMES including great moments from the International competition where the reputation of top Soviet clubs, team up against their NHL counterparts. All-Star games featuring All-Star players like The Great Gretzky, Mario Lemieux and many more! Return to the 1967 finals between the Montreal Canadiens and Toronto Maple Leafs and the days of the "Original 6". You will see great Play-off confrontations, Classic Overtime Knockouts and "Sudden Death Victories". You will witness the greatest Play-off come back of all time, the seventh game series finals and the most dramatic Doubleheader ever! All this and much, much more in GREAT PLAYS FROM GREAT GAMES!
response.title: Great Plays From Great Games
